resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107825</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107825</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974003</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Crash Scene Investigation Activities</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Systemabsturz-Szene Untersuchung Aktivitäten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activités de Recherche de Scène de Panne totale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividades Da Investigação Da Cena Do Ruído 
elétrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività Di Ricerca Di Scena Di Arresto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητες έρευνας σκηνής συντριβής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Actividades De la Investigación De la Escena De la
Caída</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Help the highway patrol recreate a deadly crash by examining the evidence and calculating the forces. Edheads helps students learn through educational games and activities designed to meet state and national standards. Teacher guides, lesson plans and classroom handouts available.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helfen Sie der Datenbahnpatrouille, einen 
tödlichen Systemabsturz neu zu erstellen, indem Sie den Beweis 
überprüfen und die Kräfte errechnen. Edheads Hilfen 
Kursteilnehmer erlernen durch pädagogische Spiele und die 
Aktivitäten, die konzipiert sind, um Zustand und nationalen Standards
zu entsprechen. Lehreranleitungen, Lektionpläne und 
Klassenzimmermitteilungsblätter vorhanden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aidez la patrouille d'omnibus à recréer une panne
totale mortelle en examinant l'évidence et en calculant les forces. 
Les étudiants d'aides d'Edheads apprennent par les jeux 
éducatifs et les activités conçus pour répondre à l'état et aux 
normes nationales. Guides de professeur, plans de leçon et 
aumônes de salle de classe disponibles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ajude à patrulha da estrada recrear um ruído 
elétrico mortal examinando a evidência e calculando as forças. 
Os estudantes das ajudas de Edheads aprendem com os jogos 
educacionais e as atividades projetados encontrar-se com o estado e 
padrões nacionais. Guias do professor, plantas da lição e 
handouts da sala de aula disponíveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aiuti la pattuglia della strada principale a 
ricreare un arresto mortale esaminando la prova e calcolando le forze.
Gli allievi di aiuti di Edheads imparano attraverso i giochi 
educativi e le attività destinate per venire a contatto di 
dichiarano e standard nazionali. Guide dell'insegnante, 
programmi di lezione e dispense dell'aula disponibili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βοηθήστε την περίπολο εθνικών οδών να αναδημιουργήσει
μια θανάσιμη συντριβή με την εξέταση των στοιχείων και τον 
υπολογισμό των δυνάμεων. Το Edheads βοηθά τους σπουδαστές
να μάθουν μέσω των εκπαιδευτικών παιχνιδιών και των 
δραστηριοτήτων με σκοπό να ανταποκριθούν στο κράτος και τα εθνικά
πρότυπα. Οδηγοί δασκάλων, σχέδια μαθήματος και φυλλάδια 
τάξεων διαθέσιμοι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ayude a la patrulla de la carretera a reconstruir 
una caída mortal examinando la evidencia y calculando las fuerzas. 
Los estudiantes de las ayudas de Edheads aprenden con juegos 
educativos y actividades diseñados para resolver el estado y 
estándares nacionales. Guías del profesor, planes de la 
lección y folletos de la sala de clase disponibles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974003</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107825</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/crash-scene-investigation-activities</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
